channel.title: Everything i need 2 know is here all in 1 post
channel.description:
[1] how would i change my home teleports.
[2] How would i add teleports to the emote section or the mage book?
[3] How would i add world objects such as stalls and ponds and stuff to fish in.
[4] is it possible to get the construction skill in a 317? if so how might i do it?
[5] how would i update my client to a more updated version with the gods. like kree,arra , general_graandorr , commander, the zammy dude?
[6] how would i change the color of the sky to a newer version instead of just a black. maybe white?
[7] how do i make it so a useer can't open a shop unless they are mod+ or admin+
[8] more on textures such as building textures

item.title: Everything i need 2 know is here all in 1 post
item.dc:creator: @mich702703 mich702703
item.description:
@mich702703 wrote:

[7] search ur donator shop (wanneshop) and change the whole shop thingy to this:

} else if(NPCID == 1860){ //the 1860 can be different just put YOUR NPCID in there if(donator == 1){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 16; //16 can be different 2 so just change agien } else sM("You must be a donator to trade me!!");

Read full topic
item.source: Everything i need 2 know is here all in 1 post

item.title: Everything i need 2 know is here all in 1 post
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[1] Search up the coords in client.java or player.java(I think)

[2] In umm texthandler.java

[3] They are objects, search for “makeglobalobject”

[4] It is possible, but no tuts are for this. This is something you would have to learn on your own.

[5] Get the gfxs, models of them. npcs, and make godwars outta them. I’m sure theirs a tut on that.

[6] FUCK, This is on the tip of my toungh, I’m sorry.

[7] Ummm, It’s something to do with adding rights to it in client.java, I don’t remember been 2 long.

[8] These would be interfaces you add to the client from downloading them.

Read full topic
item.source: Everything i need 2 know is here all in 1 post

item.title: Everything i need 2 know is here all in 1 post
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

[quote=“aces610, post:1, topic:337710”][1] how would i change my home teleports.

[2] How would i add teleports to the emote section or the mage book?

[3] How would i add world objects such as stalls and ponds and stuff to fish in.

[4] is it possible to get the construction skill in a 317? if so how might i do it?

[5] how would i update my client to a more updated version with the gods. like kree,arra , general_graandorr , commander, the zammy dude?

[6] how would i change the color of the sky to a newer version instead of just a black. maybe white?

[7] how do i make it so a useer can’t open a shop unless they are mod+ or admin+

[8] more on textures such as building textures[/quote]

[1]: i am still searching for the answer too…
[4] (almost) impossible to do, because you’ll need to have a .java file that’s compiled for 518 (where construction IS possible)

Read full topic
